Prepare your package

By Bui Quang Bao | March 24, 2021

1. Put all your package’s files in 1 folder

📁your-pkg-name
├── 📁your-pkg-name-01
├── 📁your-pkg-name-02
└── 📁your-pkg-name-03

2. Create a package.json file

📁your-pkg-name
├── 📁your-pkg-name-01
├── 📁your-pkg-name-02
└── 📁your-pkg-name-03
└── package.json

3. Edit the package.json file

{
    "name": "your-pkg-name",
    "version": "1.0.1",
    "description": "Write your package's description here.",
    "main": "your-pkg-name.js",
    "scripts": 
    {
        "test": "echo \"Error\" && exit 1"
    },
    "keywords": 
    [
        "your-package-keyword"
    ],
    "author": "Your Name Here",
    "license": "MIT"
}
